# Machine Learning

## An Introduction to Statistical Learning

This is the book website for the book ***[An Introduction to Statistical Learning with Applications in R](https://www.statlearning.com/)*** by *Gareth James, Daniela Witten, Trevor Hastie and Robert Tibshirani*. The PDF version of the book cab be downloaded and viewed online from this website. Further, data and other supporting materials such as Jupyter Notebook and R Markdown files are available.

Data for the book could also be found in my [GitHub site](https://github.com/stevenkhwun/Online-resources/tree/main/ISLR).



# Python

## Python for Data Analysis

This is the book website for the book ***[Python for Data Analysis: Data Wrangling with pandas, NumPy, and Jupyter](https://wesmckinney.com/book/)*** 3rd Edition by *Wes McKinney*. The book can be viewed online from this site. 



# R

## R for Data Science (2e)

This is the book website for the book ***[R for Data Science (2e)](https://r4ds.hadley.nz/)*** by *Hadley Wickham, Mine Ã‡etinkaya-Rundel, and Garrett Grolemund*. The book can be viewed online from this website.

The first edition of the book can be found [here](https://r4ds.had.co.nz/).

## ggplot2: Elegant Graphics for Data Analysis (3e)

This is the book website for the book ***[ggplot2: Elegant Graphics for Data Analysis (3e)](https://ggplot2-book.org/)*** by *Hadley Wickham, Danielle Navarro, and Thomas Lin Pedersen*. The book can be viewed online.

## R Markdown Cookbook

This is the book website for the book ***[R Markdown Cookbook](https://bookdown.org/yihui/rmarkdown-cookbook/)*** by *Yihui Xie, Christophe Dervieux and Emily Riederer*. The book can be viewed online from this website.
